name: Winstick
description:
Welcome to Winstick! A simple endless top-down shooter inspired by Risk of Rain 2, Binding of Isaac and Hades, with some spice of Legend of Zelda, rendered in a mild PSX style.



Survive waves of enemies, buy equipment, and see how far you can get before you get overwhelmed.



This is the first public version of the game that I'm sharing for free!

You can follow further progress, vote and involve yourself in the development of the game over at my Patreon page!
